prompt: A mystical swamp scene featuring enigmatic glowing vines twisting and curling in an intricate pattern. The vines emit a soft, eerie light that illuminates the surrounding mist and dark water. In the background, ancient, gnarled trees loom over with glowing runes carved into their bark. Strange, ethereal lights flicker through the mist, alluding to hidden enchantments and secrets. The art has a dark and vibrant fantasy style with an emphasis on the otherworldly and magical nature of the swamp.
